turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I'm so frustrated. I'm trying to figure out why my account balance is lower than I expected. Can you help me check my recent transactions?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly. To access your account, could you please verify the last four digits of your social security number and your date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's #### and my birthday is 08/15/1988. Once I verify that, can you tell me how much interest I earned on my savings account this year, and why it's so much lower than last year?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for verifying your information. I am showing that the total interest earned on your savings account this year to date is $12.47.
